amendment.description: To enhance energy conservation and research and development and to provide for security and diversity in the energy supply for the American people.

action.text: SA 3051 fell when S.A. 3050 was ruled non-germane.
Cloture on Amendment S.A. 3051 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 74.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3051 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 3051 proposed by Senator Domenici to Amendment SA 3050. (consideration: CR S4413-4422) To enhance energy conservation and research and development and to provide for security and diversity in the energy supply for the American people.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on Amendment S.A. 3051 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 74.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3051 proposed by Senator Domenici to Amendment SA 3050.
